title: You Don't Need Nice Friends Always - Yomi Fash-Lanso
content:
Yomi Fash-Lanso   
Friendship is what many people hold in high esteem; this is why some people are very choosy when it comes to that. There is a popular saying that ‘show me your friend and I will know who you are'. 
 
Popular actor, Yomi Fash-Lanso recently gave his view on the issue on his Twitter page on Tuesday, September 22, 2015. 
 
Yomi stated that it is not necessary to keep friends who are always nice, but those who would be there when mostly needed. 
 
He said, “You don't need friends that are always nice to you, sometimes you need friends that will keep it real with you when you need it most.”
